name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen Share Extension for the Kore App

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen Share Extension for the Kore App

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Kore to collaborate with colleagues. Using Kore's new real time communication features, hop on a call with a co-worker or a group and have a productive meeting from anywhere in the world
